name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: Caesar Clown's research facility on Punk Hazard where he produced SAD and conducted illegal experiments.

keyEvents.title: Caesar Stabs Monet's Heart
keyEvents.description: Caesar stabs what he believes is Smoker's heart in the laboratory, unknowingly killing Monet instead.

keyEvents.title: SAD Room Explosion
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats feel the massive explosion from the SAD production room as they race through the collapsing laboratory.

keyEvents.title: Shinokuni Gas Pursuit
keyEvents.description: The deadly Shinokuni poison gas pursues the escaping groups through the laboratory corridors.

name.japanese: パンクハザード C棟

description: The building within Punk Hazard Laboratory that housed the self-destruct button and other critical systems.

keyEvents.title: Monet's Collapse in Building C
keyEvents.description: Monet collapses in Building C after Caesar stabs her heart, her hand falling away from the self-destruct button and preventing the island's explosion.

name.japanese: パンクハザードのタンカー

description: The tanker ship docked at Punk Hazard where Franky battles Baby 5 and Buffalo to protect Caesar and prevent his rescue.

keyEvents.title: Baby 5's Revolver Girl Attack
keyEvents.description: Baby 5 uses her Revolver Girl transformation to attack Franky Shogun at the tanker.

keyEvents.title: Franky Counterattacks
keyEvents.description: Franky Shogun counterattacks Baby 5 after withstanding her assault.

geographicLocation: Punk Hazard Island docks, New World

description: The royal palace of Dressrosa where Donquixote Doflamingo rules as king. From here, he receives Buffalo's report about the failure at Punk Hazard.

keyEvents.title: Buffalo Reports to Doflamingo
keyEvents.description: Buffalo contacts Doflamingo at the palace to report that Punk Hazard was not destroyed and Caesar was captured.

keyEvents.title: Doflamingo Departs for Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: Doflamingo decides to personally handle the situation and leaps from his palace window to fly toward Punk Hazard.

name.english: Sea Between Dressrosa and Punk Hazard
name.japanese: ドレスローザとパンクハザードの間の海
name.romanized: Doresurōza to Panku Hazādo no Aida no Umi

description: The ocean expanse between Dressrosa and Punk Hazard that Doflamingo crosses using his Sora no Michi technique.

keyEvents.title: Doflamingo Uses Sora no Michi
keyEvents.description: Doflamingo runs through the sky over the ocean using his Sky Path technique, attaching strings to clouds to travel from Dressrosa toward Punk Hazard.
